joinUs.subtitle: Choose your path to success with ATM Franchise India

form.title: ATM Franchise Application Form
form.instruction: Please provide accurate information. All fields marked with * are mandatory.
form.submitMessage: Our team will review your application within 24-48 hours and contact you with next steps.

labels.referenceSource: How did you hear about us? *

terms.disclaimer: and confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete. I understand that providing false information may result in application rejection.
terms.marketingConsent: I agree to receive marketing communications and updates about ATM franchise opportunities.

successStory.title: Join 500+ Successful Franchisees
successStory.testimonial: Starting my ATM franchise was the best business decision I made. The support team guided me through every step, and now I earn steady passive income while serving my community.
successStory.name: Rajesh Kumar

roi.title: High ROI Potential
roi.description: Earn up to 50% return on investment with transparent revenue sharing

competition.title: Low Competition
competition.description: Only 15 ATMs per 1 lakh people - huge market opportunity

support.title: Complete Support
support.description: End-to-end assistance from setup to operations

agent.title: Join as Agent
agent.description: Become a field sales agent and earn commission

employee.title: Join as Employee
employee.description: Build your career with full-time positions

termsRequired.title: Terms & Conditions Required
termsRequired.description: Please agree to terms and conditions to proceed.

success.title: Application Submitted Successfully!
success.description: Our franchise team will review your application and contact you within 24-48 hours.
